data.comment: The match has started at Volkswagen Arena.
Throw-in for Hoffenheim in their own half.
In the minute 1, Throw-in for Wolfsburg in the half of Hoffenheim.
Throw-in for Wolfsburg at Volkswagen Arena.
Ball safe as Hoffenheim is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 4, Wolfsburg drives forward and Josip Brekalo gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Wolfsburg have been awarded a corner by Sven Jablonski.
Goal! Renato Steffen gives Wolfsburg a 1-0 lead.
In the minute 5, Maximilian Philipp with an assist there.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Munas Dabbur for Hoffenheim who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Hoffenheim’s Munas Dabbur is on his feet again at Volkswagen Arena.
In the minute 9, Can Hoffenheim get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Wolfsburg's half?
Wolfsburg awarded a free kick in their own half.
Wolfsburg are whistled for offside.
In the minute 10, In Wolfsburg a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Sven Jablonski awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in Hoffenheim.
In the minute 13, Wolfsburg have a goal kick.
Hoffenheim surge into the attack at Volkswagen Arena but Munas Dabbur’s header is off-target.
Ball goes out of play for a Wolfsburg goal kick.
In the minute 15, Sven Jablonski signals a free kick to Hoffenheim in their own half.
Free kick Hoffenheim.
In the minute 17, Hoffenheim to take a throw-in in Wolfsburg territory.
Xaver Schlager is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
Xaver Schlager has recovered and rejoins the match in Wolfsburg.
Wolfsburg awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 20, Goal kick for Hoffenheim at Volkswagen Arena.
Throw-in Hoffenheim.
Free kick for Wolfsburg in their own half.
In the minute 21, Ball safe as Hoffenheim is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Hoffenheim will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Wolfsburg.
Sven Jablonski awards Hoffenheim a goal kick.
In the minute 23, Free kick for Hoffenheim in their own half.
Wolfsburg awarded a free kick in their own half.
Hoffenheim drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
In the minute 25, Sven Jablonski signals a free kick to Wolfsburg in their own half.
In Wolfsburg Wolfsburg drive forward through Renato Steffen. His shot is on target but it's saved.
It's now 2-0 in Wolfsburg as Wout Weghorst scores for Wolfsburg.
In the minute 26, Renato Steffen instrumental with a fine assist.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 29, Sven Jablonski signals a free kick to Wolfsburg in their own half.
Hoffenheim's Christoph Baumgartner has been booked in Wolfsburg.
Maximilian Arnold of Wolfsburg gets in a strike, but is off target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Wolfsburg.
In the minute 31, Sven Jablonski awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Hoffenheim at Volkswagen Arena.
Throw-in for Hoffenheim in their own half.
In the minute 32, Hoffenheim awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Sven Jablonski signals a Wolfsburg throw-in in Hoffenheim's half.
Hoffenheim to take a throw-in in Wolfsburg territory.
In the minute 34, Wolfsburg needs to be cautious. Hoffenheim have an attacking throw-in.
The match at Volkswagen Arena has been interrupted briefly for a check on Maximilian Arnold, who is down injured.
Sven Jablonski signals a Hoffenheim throw-in in Wolfsburg's half.
In the minute 38, Maximilian Arnold returns to the field for Wolfsburg after picking up a slight injury.
Hoffenheim awarded a free kick in their own half.
Wolfsburg push upfield but Sven Jablonski quickly pulls them for offside.
In the minute 40, Hoffenheim are pushing forward but Ishak Belfodil's finish is wide of the goal.
Sven Jablonski awards Wolfsburg a goal kick.
Sven Jablonski awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 42, Maxence Lacroix is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
Ball goes out of play for a Wolfsburg goal kick.
Maxence Lacroix is back on his feet again.
In the minute 44, Ball safe as Hoffenheim is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Sven Jablonski signals a free kick to Wolfsburg.
The fourth official's board shows 5 minutes, which will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Throw-in Hoffenheim.
Hoffenheim awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Goal kick for Wolfsburg at Volkswagen Arena.
The first-half has ended.
In the minute 45, Sebastian Rudy (Hoffenheim) gets a yellow card.
Sven Jablonski has blown to start the second-half.
In the minute 46, Florian Grillitsch (Hoffenheim) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
Wolfsburg have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Wolfsburg in their own half.
In the minute 48, Free kick in a good position for Hoffenheim!
John Brooks (Wolfsburg) has received a yellow card from Sven Jablonski.
In Wolfsburg, Florian Grillitsch (Hoffenheim) misses the target with a header.
In the minute 49, It's a goal kick for the home team in Wolfsburg.
Wolfsburg are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
Throw-in for Wolfsburg at Volkswagen Arena.
In the minute 52, Wolfsburg's Josip Brekalo gets in a shot on goal at Volkswagen Arena. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Can Wolfsburg get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Hoffenheim's half?
Corner awarded to Wolfsburg.
In the minute 54, Wout Weghorst (Wolfsburg) goes close with a header but the ball is scrambled away by Hoffenheim defenders.
Free kick for Wolfsburg in the half of Hoffenheim.
Ridle Baku for Wolfsburg drives towards goal at Volkswagen Arena. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 55, Throw-in for Hoffenheim in their own half.
Throw-in for Wolfsburg in the half of Hoffenheim.
Free kick for Hoffenheim in their own half.
In the minute 58, Wolfsburg have been awarded a corner by Sven Jablonski.
In the minute 59, Wolfsburg awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Sebastian Hoeness (Hoffenheim) is making a first substitution, with Sargis Adamyan replacing Florian Grillitsch.
Mijat Gacinovic is replacing Ishak Belfodil for Hoffenheim at Volkswagen Arena.
Throw-in high up the field for Hoffenheim in Wolfsburg.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Wolfsburg.
In the minute 61, Sven Jablonski signals a free kick to Wolfsburg.
Ball safe as Hoffenheim is awarded a throw-in in their half.
The home team have replaced Maximilian Philipp with Admir Mehmedi. This is the first substitution made today by Oliver Glasner.
In the minute 63, Free kick for Hoffenheim in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Free kick for Wolfsburg in the half of Hoffenheim.
In the minute 66, Hoffenheim have a goal kick.
In Wolfsburg, Wolfsburg push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
In Wolfsburg a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 67, Hoffenheim's Munas Dabbur misses with an attempt on goal.
Sven Jablonski awards Wolfsburg a goal kick.
Sven Jablonski signals a free kick to Hoffenheim in their own half.
In the minute 69, Free kick Wolfsburg.
Hoffenheim awarded a free kick in their own half.
Hoffenheim to take a throw-in in Wolfsburg territory.
Wolfsburg make their second substitution with Yannick Gerhardt replacing Josip Brekalo.
In the minute 71, Joao Victor is on a sub for Renato Steffen for Wolfsburg.
Sven Jablonski signals a free kick to Hoffenheim.
In the minute 72, Hoffenheim's Sargis Adamyan gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Wolfsburg defender.
Corner awarded to Hoffenheim.
Can Hoffenheim get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Wolfsburg's half?
In the minute 73, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Hoffenheim push upfield and Munas Dabbur gets his head to the ball. The attempt is cleared by an alert Wolfsburg defence.
Corner awarded to Hoffenheim.
In the minute 74, Throw-in for Wolfsburg close to the penalty box.
Sebastian Hoeness is making the team's third substitution at Volkswagen Arena with Ihlas Bebou replacing Diadie Samassekou.
Wolfsburg's Xaver Schlager misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 75, Goal kick for Hoffenheim at Volkswagen Arena.
Hoffenheim have been awarded a corner by Sven Jablonski.
Corner awarded to Hoffenheim.
In the minute 77, Sven Jablonski signals a free kick to Wolfsburg in their own half.
Throw-in for Hoffenheim at Volkswagen Arena.
Sven Jablonski signals a Hoffenheim throw-in in Wolfsburg's half.
In the minute 78, Throw-in Wolfsburg.
Throw-in for Hoffenheim in the half of Wolfsburg.
Hoffenheim are coming forward and Mijat Gacinovic gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 80, Ball goes out of play for a Wolfsburg goal kick.
Sven Jablonski awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 82, Wolfsburg's Wout Weghorst is on target but unsuccessful.
Wolfsburg have been awarded a penalty in Wolfsburg...
At Volkswagen Arena, Kevin Vogt has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Wout Weghorst (Wolfsburg) has missed a penalty!
In the minute 85, Hoffenheim to take a throw-in in Wolfsburg territory.
Sargis Adamyan of Hoffenheim smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Hoffenheim have been awarded a corner by Sven Jablonski.
In the minute 87, Throw-in for Hoffenheim in the half of Wolfsburg.
Free kick Hoffenheim.
Sven Jablonski signals a Hoffenheim throw-in in Wolfsburg's half.
Hoffenheim are back in the match in Wolfsburg. Sargis Adamyan has scored to make it 2-1.
In the minute 87, Great play from Kevin Vogt to set up the goal.
Klauss is replacing Melayro Bogarde for Hoffenheim at Volkswagen Arena.
In the minute 89, Sven Jablonski awards Wolfsburg a goal kick.
Wolfsburg advance rapidly upfield but Sven Jablonski blows for offside.
Important block from the Hoffenheim defence as Joao Victor fires in a strike for Wolfsburg.
Hoffenheim awarded a free kick in their own half.
4 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Free kick for Wolfsburg in their own half.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Hoffenheim close to the penalty box.
Hoffenheim have been awarded a corner by Sven Jablonski.
Hoffenheim have been given a penalty...
Munas Dabbur (Hoffenheim) places the ball on the penalty spot ... And fails to net!
Corner awarded to Hoffenheim.
Sven Jablonski blows to end the match. The final score is 2-1.
The home team have replaced Xaver Schlager with Marin Pongracic. This is the fourth substitution made today by Oliver Glasner.
